note: I make stupid jokes about academia & am a professor at Tel Aviv University. I specialize in transgenerational epigenetic inheritance (using C. elegans mostly). In my lab we study many other things as well, for example we try to decipher the Dead Sea Scrolls using ancient DNA sequencing, examine the molecular and neuronal basis of irrationality & engineer parasites to deliver proteins to the brain.   Check out my lab’s website:  OdedRechavilab.com
